puzzle.title: Napkins
puzzle.hint: What do you use to call someone?

Voicemail Transcription:
Hi puzzler.
I am so glad you figured out my number.
Now listen carefully for your final quest.
In order to make the other knights *green* with envy, you must slay the *dragon* that slumbers in the valley between the *yam hills* and the *bell mountain*.
Good Luck. (giggles)
The solution is GREEN DRAGON, located between Belmont and Yamhill.
